Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Musa ne akhi'a, usa vele maim (uha kama) kita si mere tom galati ho ga'i
Phira mainu tuhade lokam tom dara lagi'a ate maim tuhade tom (darada) bhaja gi'a. Phira mainu mere raba ne gi'ana bakhasi'a ate mainu paigabara bana dita
Ate iha ahisana hai jihara tusim mainu jata'unde ho ki tusim isara'ila di aulada nu gulama bana li'a
Phira'aina ne kiha, ki sare sasara da raba (rasula alamina) tom ki bhava hai
Musa ne kiha, akasam ate dharati da raba ate usa da vi raba jihara inham de vicakara hai (alaha hai) jekara tusim visavasa karana vale ho
Phira'auna ne apane ase pase vali'am nu kiha ki tusim sunade nahim' ho
Musa alai ne kiha, uha tuhada vi raba hai ate tuhade pi'o dadi'am da vi
Phira'auna ne kiha tuhada iha rasula jihara tuhade vala bheji'a gi'a hai suda'i hai
Musa ne kiha, puraba ate pachama da raba hai ate usa da vi jihara kujha (puraba te pachama de) vicakara hai. Jekara tusim baî€¼udhi rakhade ho
Phira'auna ne kiha jekara tusim mere tom binham kise hora nu apana pujanika bana'i'a tam maim tuhanu kaidi bana lavanga
Musa ne kiha, jekara saim' ko'i sapasata ciza pesa karam tam vi
Phira'auna ne kiha je tusim sace ho tam usa nu pesa karo
Phira musa ne apani soti (zamina te) suta diti tam uha acanaka pratakha ajagara bana ga'i
Ate usa ne apana hatha kacha (bagala) vico bahara kadhi'a tam acanaka vekhana vali'am ne vekhi'a uha camaka riha si
Phira'aina ne apane nere tere baithe saradaram nu kiha ki iha bada tam mahira jadugara hai
Ate iha cahuda hai ki iha apane jadu nala tuhanu tuhade desa vicom kadha deve tam tuhadi ki ra'i hai
Darabari'am ne kiha isa nu ate isa de bhara nu mauka devo ate sahiram vica apane dhaphaurazi bhejo
Ki uha apa de kola sare mahira jadugaram nu lai a'una
Phira jadugara ika nisacita dina ute ikathe kite ga'e
Ate lokam nu kiha gi'a ki tusim sare loka ikathe honvo
